mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.artno AS "artno", a.logo AS "logo", a.sort AS "sort", a.market_price AS "marketPrice", a.price AS "price", a.brand_id AS "brand.id", b.name AS "brand.name", a.state AS "state", a.spec1 AS "spec1", a.spec2 AS "spec2", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_goods( id, name, artno, logo, sort, market_price, price, brand_id, state, spec1, spec2, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{artno}, #{logo}, #{sort}, #{marketPrice}, #{price}, #{brand.id}, #{state}, #{spec1}, #{spec2}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE s_goods SET name = #{name}, artno = #{artno}, logo = #{logo}, sort = #{sort}, market_price = #{marketPrice}, price = #{price}, brand_id = #{brand.id}, state = #{state}, spec1 = #{spec1}, spec2 = #{spec2}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
